alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Levy; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Levy; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:36PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus, western Pasco, western Hernando and southeastern Levy Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 636 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Beverly Hills to near Jasmine Estates. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Brooksville, Inverness, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Hudson, Weeki Wachee, South Brooksville, Black Diamond, North Brooksville, Hernando County Airport, Timber Pines, Crystal River Airport, Homosassa, Weeki Wachee Gardens, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Pine Island, North Weeki Wachee and Jasmine Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
